#1. Packages and df
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(codebook)
library(tidyverse)
library(future)
library(Hmisc)
load("cccu_MA.RData")
```


#2. Codebook for predictors and outcome

```{r}
codebook_predictors_outcome = cccu_MA %>%
  select(switch, hc, contra_satis, hc_dur, sexual_satisfaction, sex_freq)

codebook(codebook_predictors_outcome, missingness_report = FALSE, indent = "##")
```

#3. Codebook for selection variables
```{r}
codebook_selection = cccu_MA %>%
  select(AGE, DEGREE_recode, POVRATE, HLTHPROB_recode, MEDPROB_recode, GAPINS_recode, TYPEINS_recode, NKIDS_t1, pregnant_between_waves, had_baby_between_waves, Avoid_r, FEELPG_recode, rel_dur_factor)

codebook(codebook_selection, missingness_report = FALSE, indent = "##")
```

#Plots


#Correlations

##Predictors
```{r}
cccu_MA_t1__pred_correlations <- cccu_MA_t1 %>%
  select(contra_satis, hc_dur,
    sexual_satisfaction,
    AGE, POVRATE, Avoid_r, FEELPG_recode,
    rel_dur)

cor_pred_t1<-rcorr(as.matrix(cccu_MA_t1_pred_correlations))
print(cor_pred_t1)

```

##Selection Variables
```{r}
#numerical
correlations_selection = cccu_MA %>%
  select(AGE,  POVRATE, Avoid_r, FEELPG_recode)

cor_sel<-rcorr(as.matrix(correlations_selection))
print(cor_sel)

```
